Monitoring

You don't need to worry if your website is still working when you sleep. There are automatic tools that will notify you when it's down or has some errors.

Uptime Robot

  • Free
  • 5 minutes check rate
  • 50 monitors
  • 1 location
  • Free status pages
  • Content matching help
  • Shows average response time
  • Integration with email, webhooks, Twitter, Hipchat, Pushbullet, Pushover, Slack, Boxcar 2
  • Free email-to-SMS help
  • (optional) $15 for 100 SMS
  • Open Uptime Robot

StatusCake

  • Free
  • 5 minutes check rate
  • 10 monitors
  • 1 random location
  • Paid status pages
  • No content matching
  • Shows average response time
  • Integration with over 10 different services (email, webhooks, Twitter, Pushbullet, etc.)
  • No email-to-SMS
  • (optional) $7.49 for 50 SMS
  • Open StatusCake

Affiliate links

Affiliate links have a special code in the URL. If you register from this link, some companies will give free credits to either both of us or just to me (depending on how a company set up their affiliation program - I always ask if they have some coupon codes that will give credits to both sides). Those credits can be used on their website (for a few months of free hosting, a cheaper domain, etc.) or redeemed for money (only for domains providers).

Affiliation program doesn't affect whether a company is recommended or not. You can read more about how I select companies/tools on the About & contact page.
